vehicles.description: An orange forklift is located to the right of our vehicle on the same road, partially entering our lane.
vehicles.explanation: The position of the forklift may pose an obstacle, requiring this vehicle to slow down or change lanes to avoid it.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A person wearing a high-visibility vest stands on the road to the left of a car, looking down at what appears to be a clipboard.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The presence of workers on the road is a safety concern, indicating that there may be temporary work activities in the area that could affect traffic flow.

traffic lights.description: A green traffic light is visible ahead, applicable to the direction in which the vehicle is traveling.
traffic lights.explanation: The green light indicates that the vehicle may proceed legally, but cautious driving is advised due to road workers and forklifts in the vicinity.

barriers.description: The green fabric barrier is located on the right side of the vehicle, which likely indicates that construction or maintenance work is underway by the roadside.
barriers.explanation: These obstacles may sometimes appear in construction areas, potentially leading to changes in temporary traffic patterns, requiring extra caution.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, the following road users and objects are present:

An orange forklift is located to the right of our vehicle on the same road, partially entering our lane. The position of the forklift may pose an obstacle, requiring this vehicle to slow down or change lanes to avoid it.

A person wearing a high-visibility vest stands on the road to the left of a car, looking down at what appears to be a clipboard. The presence of workers on the road is a safety concern, indicating that there may be temporary work activities in the area that could affect traffic flow.

A green traffic light is visible ahead, applicable to the direction in which the vehicle is traveling. The green light indicates that the vehicle may proceed legally, but cautious driving is advised due to road workers and forklifts in the vicinity.

A green fabric barrier is located on the right side of the vehicle, which likely indicates that construction or maintenance work is underway by the roadside. These obstacles may sometimes appear in construction areas, potentially leading to changes in temporary traffic patterns, requiring extra caution.

driving_suggestion: When driving your own vehicle, proceed with caution and maintain a safe speed to prepare for the appearance of forklifts and workers. If necessary, be ready to change lanes to the left, and always give way to road workers. Pay attention to any additional signs or signals related to construction or road work. Drive carefully through construction zones. Slow down and be prepared to stop or maneuver around forklifts that become obstacles. Stay alert for workers and any unexpected movements, and keep a safe distance. Continue to monitor traffic lights, making sure they are still green as you approach intersections.

1.description and explanation: A construction vehicle is present, likely part of a nearby work zone. The vehicle appears to be a forklift, commonly used for lifting and moving materials. Its presence suggests that there may be ongoing construction activity in the area, which could lead to potential road obstructions or temporary traffic diversions. The driver of the ego car must remain vigilant for any signage indicating detours or road work ahead, obeying any altered traffic patterns or reduced speed limits for safety.
